document_data.name: Dalchatha Maereegh
document_data.mainbody: '''Dalchatha Maereegh''' was a [[high priest]] of [[Moander]], the Rotting God, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
In addition to being the high priest of the [[Hidden Glades]] temple in the [[Chondalwood]], Maereegh was also the [[Mouth of Moander]]â€”a title given to the highest ranking servant of Moander and the leader of the [[god]]'s cult. She attained this title upon the death of the previous holder, [[Mogion]], in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.

Dalchatha controlled a vast network of spies and special task forces. She kept Moander fed with an endless supply of victims. In exchange, Moander blessed her with perpetual youth.
